Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

Thought it was about time I actually got around to joining the forums at long last and introducing myself.. Being that I've been lurking here for god knows how long and playing since 0.18 anyway ^.^

So hey, my name's Dan and I'm a self proclaimed KSP addict.. been loving the way the game has been progressing. I can genuinely say that a game hasn't captured my interest and imagination SO MUCH for many many years.. good job Squad, keep up the good work! (oh, and thankyou for 1.0.5, stable as anything, 1.0.4 was crashing left right and centre for me across all my machines).

Oh, and I think I broke Bill ....

[IMG]http://dan.heronx.co.uk/poor_bill.png[/IMG]

Guess that's what you get when you bail out of a jet doing 300 m/s on a collision course with the SPH! ^.^

Kerbals break all the time. Just hammer out the dents, and he'll be fine.

Welcome to the forum (membership). :D

Hello asphytotlxtc, and welcome to the forums!

Oh noooo! Not Bill! :)

Happy landings!
Welcome to the forums! As for what happened to Bill, I think he'll recover after three or four... uh... years.

Ah thanks for the warm welcome guys! You'll be glad to know Bill made a full recovery.. Jeb on the other hand.. they're still picking his bits out of the space plane hanger doors I think... ^.^

Gotta say, loving these new afterburning jets.. new favourite part!
